featured.text: Future plans include a cooperative effort among many nations to stop littering in space and to clean up the trash already there.
Thus, efforts are being made to reduce the environmental impact of the tourism industry.
It all depends on whether you think it is worth the effort.

However, a man known as Mestre Bimba devoted a great deal of time and effort to convincing the Brazilian authorities that Capoeira has great cultural value and should become an official fighting style.
You can help save three lives for only $5 by supporting this effort.

other.text: The 2011 Nobel Peace Prize was awarded _____ to three women for the efforts they made in fighting for women’s rights.

It is not __(31)__ to hear friends and family members talk about the difficulty they have in __(32)__ the stress of everyday life and the efforts they make to control the events __(33)__ cause stress.
The Icelandic success is accomplished largely through cooperative efforts across various industries.
I think that this new program will be __________of your effort.
It was officially recognized in Brazil through the effort of Mestre Bimba.
Few people will trust you if you continue making _____ promises and never make efforts to keep them.
Over the course of the morning, the innovative discussion process 14 a new form of collective effort that transformed the depth, scope, and quality of their discussion.
The Ethiopian government has spared no efforts in promoting running.
It often demands even greater effort in adjustment since we are not quick enough to catch up with the new time schedule.

definition.zh_def: 努力；付出的心力或精力。
definition.example: She put a lot of effort into her studies.
